name: Romanian IT Companies Dashboard
description: A dashboard to search for IT companies in Romania and view financial data.
longDescription: A full-stack application built using Node.js and React that combines public data from two datasets on data.gov.ro, one containing financial indicators and the other with company details such as location, which are joined by the unique company identifier (CUI). The application presents this data in a comprehensive dashboard. Users can filter the data by various indicators and view statistics about these companies.
purpose: To provide access to public financial information about Romanian IT companies in a free, user-friendly format.
features: A table to view and sort company data
Filter options to refine company search based on multiple criteria such as number of employees, CAEN code, CUI, and revenue
Statistics page with insights like total employees, average revenue, etc.
technologiesDetailed: Backend: Node.js with Express and SQLite for the database
Frontend: React for the UI, with Redux for state management
Hosting: Deployed on an AWS EC2 instance with Nginx as a reverse proxy

name: Fitness Tracker
description: An application to track workouts, set goals, and get AI-generated workout recommendations.
longDescription: A single-page React application that allows users to log workouts, set fitness goals, and get AI-generated workout routines based on user preferences. The app displays detailed statistics about users' fitness progress and provides insights to help achieve goals faster.
purpose: To help users track their fitness progress, set personalized goals, and improve their health with AI-powered workout suggestions.
features: Dashboard with workout statistics, including total workout time, favorite exercises, and active days
Create custom workouts (cardio, strength training, flexibility)
AI-generated workouts based on user preferences
technologiesDetailed: Frontend: React for the UI and state management using hooks
AI integration: Uses a simple AI algorithm to generate workout suggestions
Charts: Utilizes charting libraries to display workout statistics

name: Job Application Tracker
description: A tool to keep track of job applications.
longDescription: A full-stack application built using C# and React to help users track and manage job applications. It includes features like a dashboard, statistics, and charts to visualize application progress.
purpose: To have a personal centralized place to manage job applications across various platforms.
features: Dashboard with table to add/edit/remove applications
Statistics page with visualizations for average applications per month and more
technologiesDetailed: Backend: ASP.NET Core for API development
Database: SQL Server for persistent storage
Frontend: React with hooks and context for state management
